Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Establishes a tax on carbon emissions from non-essential helicopter flights in cities with N.Y. city
Summary: Establishes a tax on carbon emissions from non-essential helicopter flights in cities with a population of one million or more.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a tax on carbon emissions from non-essential helicopter flights in cities with a population of one million or more
